info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 3:43PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern McDowell, northeastern Rutherford and southwestern Burke Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 343 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Morganton to 10 miles south of Marion. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morganton, Valdese, Drexel, Glen Alpine, Lake James State Park, Lake Rhodhiss, Table Rock, South Mountains State Park, Lake James and Rutherford College. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
